lyrics:
44 contributorstranslationsespa√±olall around me lyricsverse 1
my hands are searching for you
my arms are outstretched towards you
i feel you on my fingertips
my tongue dances behind my lips for you
this fire runs in through my being
burning im not used to seeing you

prechorus
im alive
im alive

chorus
i can feel you all around me
thickening the air im breathing
holding on to what im feeling
savoring this heart thats healing

verse 2
my hands float up above me
and you whisper you love me
and i begin to fade
into our secret place
the music makes me sway
the angels singing say we are alone with you
i am alone and they are too with you

bridge
and so i cry holy
the light is white holy
and i see you

bridge

now you own me all i am
you said you would never leave me
i believe you i believe
